newsitem.title: USA: SPSS, Arbor to integrate products.
newsitem.headline: SPSS, Arbor to integrate products.

text.p: SPSS Inc and Arbor Software Corp said Monday they entered into a partnership to create an interface which will integrate the two companies' flagship products.
SPSS provides statistical analysis or "data mining" software, and Arbor provides software for business planning, analysis and management reporting.

The companies plan to integrate Arbor's Essbase multidimensional database server and SPSS's statistical analysis software, which they said will help users find new correlations, patterns and trends in their data.
